column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I've been to quite a few brunch places in Chicago
column3: Wildberry Cafe has the best bang for your buck. My girlfriend and I came here looking for a reasonably priced
column5: and we got not only that but more. The omelete that I had was extremely tasty
column6: and the skillet that my girlfriend got was perfect. In addition
column7: Wildberry let us upgrade the pancakes that were supposed to come with our entrees to special pancakes. It'll take me a few days to work off those calories
column8: but they sure were worth it.
